item.description:
## Gets the service consumption indicated to EaTL and the Parameters of the request processed?
#### Requires:
- ExecutionAndTraceLog server to operate

#### Preparation:
- GETing CC (/core-model-1-4:control-construct)
  - search CC for output fc-port of ServiceRequestCausesLoggingRequest, 
its corresponding op-c, http-c and tcp-c, storing them for later verification request
- GETting EaTL/CC (while using IP and port from above)
   - searching CC for op-c of /v1/list-records-of-flow, storing operation-key
- POST /v1/update-flow-visualization-page
    - auth-code from input load-file
    - random generated x-correlator
    - reasonable parameters

#### Testing:
- POST ExecutionAndTraceLog/v1/list-records-of-flow with 
   - IP and port from above
   - operation-key from above
   - DummyValue of x-correlator
   - checking response for entry with application-name==RSR and operation-name==/v1/update-flow-visualization-page
   - checking same record for containing DummyXCorrelator &DummyTraceIndicator

#### Clearing:
- not applicable

item.description:
#Gets the response body checked for presence and correctness of each required attributes against load file

#### Preparation:
- GETing CC (/core-model-1-4:control-construct
- searching CC for op-s of /v1/update-flow-visualization-page, storing it.
 - search CC for output fc-port of ServiceRequestCausesLoggingRequest, 
its corresponding op-c, http-c and tcp-c, storing them for later verification request
- GET EATL/CC, find operation-key of /v1/lis-records and /v1/list-records-of-flow
- POST /v1/list-records, 
   - find random x-correlator from list of records and store it
- POST /v1/list-records-of-flow- for above stored x-correlator
   - store the list of records for given x-correlator
- POST /v1/update-flow-visualization-page with
     - auth-code from input load-file
     - x-correlator from above step
      - reasonable parameters 

#### Testing:
- Checking for response-code 200
- checking the response body for each attribute against the specification
- checking each record against above stored list of records retrieved from EATL for given x-correlator

#### Clearing:
- not applicable

item.description:
## Gets the forwarding happened for the incoming request?
RequestForVisualizingFlowCausesRetrievingListOfRecordsIfAuthenticationSucceeds

#### Requires:
- ExecutionAndTraceLog server to operate

#### Preparation:
- GETing CC (/core-model-1-4:control-construct)
  -  search CC for output fc-port of ServiceRequestCausesLoggingRequest, 
its corresponding op-c, http-c and tcp-c, storing them for later verification request
  - searching CC for output fc-port of RequestForVisualizingFlowCausesRetrievingListOfRecordsIfAuthenticationSucceeds, find corresponding op-c, http-c and tcp-c, store them.
- GETting EaTL/CC (while using IP, protocol and port from above)
  - searching CC for op-c of /v1/list-records-of-flow, storing operation-key
- POST /v1/update-flow-visualization-page with  
  - random generated x-correlator
  - auth-code from input load-file
  - all parameters with realistic values (incl. DummyXCorrelator)

#### Testing:
- POST ExecutionAndTraceLog/v1/list-records-of-flow with 
   - IP, protocol and port from above
   - operation-key from above
   - DummyValue of x-correlator
   - checking response 
   - checking same record for containing DummyXCorrelator and applicatin-name and release-number with randomly chosen values.

#### Clearing:
- not applicable
